example-dispute-section.heading: A Common Dispute in the New Economy
example-dispute-section.illustration-1: Alice hires Bob to build her a website.
example-dispute-section.illustration-3: The site takes Bob longer than expected.
example-dispute-section.illustration-4: When he finally delivers the site, Alice is not satisfied.
example-dispute-section.illustration-5: A debate starts. Alice requests a refund. Bob claims the specifications weren't clear.
example-dispute-section.illustration-6: Alice and Bob are both left at a loss with no clear outcome of their dispute

internet-economy-section.heading: The Internet Economy
internet-economy-section.paragraph: As our lives move to global online platforms, disputes arise in areas that cannot be solved by traditional court systems.

why-kleros-section.heading: Why Kleros?
why-kleros-section.paragraph-1: A peer to peer platform that uses crowdsourcing and blockchain to put the dispute resolution process in the hands of the community.
why-kleros-section.paragraph-2: Kleros uses advanced cryptoeconomics coupled with a global community of jurors to adjudicate disputes in a fast, affordable and open way. Read the white paper.
why-kleros-section.title-3: Why Does Kleros Need a Token?
why-kleros-section.paragraph-3: The Pinakion (PNK) token protects the system from attacks, while also providing jurors with a financial incentive to resolve cases coherently. Learn more here.

how-does-it-work-section.heading: How Does It Work?
how-does-it-work-section.paragraph-1: Alice hires Bob to build a website for her. They agree to use Kleros should a dispute occur.
how-does-it-work-section.paragraph-2: Alice is not satisfied with Bob's work and raises a dispute.
how-does-it-work-section.paragraph-3: Users are randomly selected as jurors for the dispute.
how-does-it-work-section.paragraph-4: Jurors evaluate the evidence and vote Alice as the winner. She is reimbursed and honest jurors are compensated for their work.

justice-revolution-section.paragraph-2: Integrate Kleros powerful dispute resolution technology in your platform. For free.
